name: Criminal Investigation - Las Vegas Case
description:
Criminal Investigation - Las Vegas Case is a super addictive brain puzzle, where you will have to find the differences between two pictures each time you play - have fun and prove your sight skills now!

A must-have for all Spot the difference lovers!

Game Features:
- 20+ play scenes available.
- Support for iPad devices.
- Hints and boosters which will help you to find all the evidences.
- iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus support!
- iOS 8 support

Have fun solving the cases.
